about.title: About Me
about.quote: Just me, my camera, and some great memories.
about.intro: Welcome to my personal corner of the internet. I created this website to share my favorite photos from my daily life, travels, and everything in between.
about.description: I'm not a professional photographerâ€”I just love keeping memories alive. Whether it's a sunset, a fun day out with friends, or a beautiful view, these are the moments that mean the most to me.
